projects.name: Learnblock
projects.description: Learnblock is a simple, interactive web application that demonstrates the workings of blockchain technology. Users can visualize key concepts like block creation, hashing, and peer-to-peer networks in an easy-to-understand format.
requirements: - A modern web browser (Chrome, Firefox, etc.)
installation: 1. Open the terminal or command prompt.
3. Navigate to the directory: cd learnblock
6. Open your browser and visit: http://localhost:3000
projects.support: For help or inquiries, email: support@learnblock.com

projects.name: MovieBase
projects.description: MovieBase is a dynamic web application for browsing movies and TV shows. It uses the TMDB API to show top-rated, trending, and upcoming titles, and includes features for searching specific content.
requirements: - A modern web browser (Chrome, Firefox, etc.)
installation: 1. Open the terminal or command prompt.
2. Clone the repository: git clone https://github.com/SatamSai/moviebase.git
3. Navigate to the directory: cd moviebase
6. Open your browser and visit: http://localhost:3000
projects.support: For help or inquiries, email: support@moviebase.com

projects.name: KanbanFlow
projects.description: KanbanFlow is a task management web application that allows users to create boards and tasks, manage roles, and provides JWT-based authentication. It is built using the MERN stack with secure APIs.
requirements: - A modern web browser (Chrome, Firefox, etc.)
installation: 1. Open the terminal or command prompt.
3. Navigate to the directory: cd kanbanflow
5. Run the application: npm run dev
6. Open your browser and visit: http://localhost:3000
projects.support: For help or inquiries, email: support@kanbanflow.com
